name: ISO Interactive
tag_list: virtual-world, facebook, online-games, action-games, developer, mmorpg, mmo, smartfoxserver, award-winning, iso, iso-interactive, flash, flex-developer, shockwaveserver
overview:
We build online games and multi user online virtual environments for various clients using SmartFoxServer with FLEX, Flash, shockwave and Unity 3D.

We are also developing and additional revenue stream with our own Action Adventure Game and Virtual World called MyMe Adventure.

  1. Please see our capabilities document at: http://www.isointeractive.com/assets/uploadedfiles/ISOCompany_Overview.pdf

  2. View a demo at: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1bPqocE_gN4

external_links.title: Demo of MyMe Adventure Game Project
